channel.title: Adding emote id for teleporting help
channel.description:
teleport by clicking on the emotes « on: August 25, 2008, 07:45:48 am » Quote Modify Remove
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- you know the screen where all the emotes are whats the name of the file so i can change the coord it teles you to if you can help that be great
Report to moderator 68.2.98.142
Rog3r Senior Member
Rep: 92 [Rep++] Offline
Re: teleport by clicking on the emotes « Reply #1 on: August 25, 2008, 07:49:19 am » Quote
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Once you get the action button, in case 185 in your client.java, do this:
case EMOTEbuttonID: teleportToX = ; teleportToY = ; break;
Report to moderator Logged

Honor Swords Warned Member
Rep: 10 Online
Re: teleport by clicking on the emotes « Reply #2 on: August 25, 2008, 08:02:16 am » Quote Modify Remove
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- i already have them i cant seem to find ones already made in my client.java i was to edit the cord but there not in there what other file can they be in lol?
Posted on: August 25, 2008, 08:03:23 am -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- and case 185 has cape emote stuff
Posted on: August 26, 2008, 05:35:22 am -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- in case 185 it says this now where do i put this
Once you get the action button, in case 185 in your client.java, do this:
case EMOTEbuttonID: teleportToX = ; teleportToY = ; break
case 185: // clicking most buttons actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId); } switch (actionButtonId) { case 28164: case 28165: case 28166: case 28168: case 28215: case 28171: case 28170: case 28172: case 28178: break;
case 28173: case 28174: case 28169: case 28175: case 28167: case 28176: case 28177: case 28179: case 28180: break;

 Re: teleport by clicking on the emotes

« Reply #2 on: August 25, 2008, 08:02:16 am » Quote Modify Remove

i already have them i cant seem to find ones already made in my client.java i was to edit the cord but there not in there what other file can they be in lol?

Posted on: August 25, 2008, 08:03:23 am

and case 185 has cape emote stuff

Posted on: August 26, 2008, 05:35:22 am

in case 185 it says this now where do i put this

Once you get the action button, in case 185 in your client.java, do this:

case EMOTEbuttonID:
teleportToX = ;
teleportToY = ;
break

case 185: // clicking most buttons
actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {
println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId);
}
switch (actionButtonId) {
case 28164:
case 28165:
case 28166:
case 28168:
case 28215:
case 28171:
case 28170:
case 28172:
case 28178:
break;

        case 28173:
        case 28174:
        case 28169:
        case 28175:
        case 28167:
        case 28176:
        case 28177:
        case 28179:
        case 28180:
            break;
